about_the_game:
The four hell demons and fallen angels Abbadon, Beelzebub, Astaroth and Lucifer have opened portals from hell and have appeared on earth. With their monster armies they terrorize everything and everyone. The creatures throw fire around and simply appear out of nowhere. Four areas have been contaminated by the invasion.

For this reason, a special unit was founded to get the plague under control. The Paranormal Task Force.

Fight as a soldier of the Paranormal Task Force and destroy the zombie armies, eliminate the fallen angels and close the portals.

The game is an easy-to-use first-person shooter where you can sprint, reload, shoot and heal. You can play with an XBOX controller or with a mouse and keyboard. The game uses common keyboard layouts such as WASD and Shift. You only have a certain number of shots at a time and a life bar is displayed.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Mutilated people in the game (zombies)
- Realistic depiction of violence: shooting, fire, explosions
- Blood splatters
